summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical underground distribution easements over portions of Homecroft; southeast quarter of Section 9, Township 25 North, Range 4 East; Government Lot 1, Section 16, Township 25 North, Range 4 East; vacated Hillside Place; northwest quarter of Section 25, Township 26 North, Range 3 East; Bayview Addition to Salmon Bay; and Government Lot 4 in Section 34, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, as described below and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
